task.en: Use the Reminder app to remind me to `Remember to check out at Oslo`.
task.zh: 用Reminder app创建提醒事项"Remember to check out at Oslo"。
task.ar: استخدم تطبيق التذكير Reminder لتذكيري بـ "Remember to check out at Oslo".
task.ja: Reminderアプリで「Remember to check out at Oslo」というリマインダーを作成してください。
task.ru: С помощью приложения Reminder создайте напоминание "Remember to check out at Oslo".

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Reminders" to get the name of every reminder whose completed is false' | grep -q "Remember to check out at Oslo" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"
